title: x-flow
description: JSON Schema for the x-flow OpenAPI extension, defining payment lifecycle states and transitions.

id.description: Unique identifier for this flow definition.

current_state.description: The state that the resource is in when this operation is invoked or returns.

description.description: Human-readable description of this flow step.

header.description: HTTP header name used to carry the idempotency key.

required.description: Whether the idempotency header is mandatory.

transitions.description: List of possible state transitions from current_state.

target_state.description: The state the resource moves to after a successful transition.

condition.description: Human-readable condition under which this transition occurs.

trigger_type.description: Mechanism that triggers the state transition.
